Package org.demoiselle.signer.policy.engine.factory

Class PolicyFactory

java.lang.Object
org.demoiselle.signer.policy.engine.factory.PolicyFactory
public class PolicyFactory extends Object
FIXME move to policy.engine package? FIXME should we value https over http to get policies? Factory for the digital signature policies defined by ICP-BRASIL. Consulte portal do ITI para detalhes.
